title: AIML - Sr Engineering Program Manager, Siri Perception
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Do you love taking on challenges that create a positive impact? Are you passionate about powering many ground-breaking intelligent experiences to be made? The Siri Assistant team is building groundbreaking technology... and we are looking for people like you!
description: This role is for a problem solver who is excited by defining and driving an impeccable user experience. You will coordinate and drive early engagements on product architecture, feature definition and program execution. This includes collaborating with all partner organizations relevant for a project. You will:
preferred_qualifications:
Experience working with voice assistant technology
Experience shipping ML powered end user products
education_experience: Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field
